interface.name: FileFilter
interface.javadoc:
A filter for abstract pathnames.

Instances of this interface may be passed to the {@link File#listFiles(java.io.FileFilter) listFiles(FileFilter)} method of the {@link java.io.File} class. 1.2

Tests whether or not the specified abstract pathname should be included in a pathname list.
pathname The abstract pathname to be tested
true if and only if pathname should be included
